about_the_game:
Virtual Sniper invites you to step into the shoes of a professional sniper and embark on an adrenaline-fueled adventure. Engage in missions set across three unique and immersive environments: a bustling city, a remote oil field, and a seemingly peaceful neighborhood. With realistic bullet physics, detailed graphics, and compelling game mechanics, you’ll find yourself at the heart of the action.

More than just a shooting game, Virtual Sniper is a simulation that requires strategy, tactics, and precision. As you succeed in missions, you’ll earn rewards that can be used to unlock new weapons or upgrade your existing arsenal, preparing you for even more challenging objectives.

This highly realistic experience will redefine the way you view the world of gaming.

Three Unique Maps

  • Oil Field: A desolate industrial zone with wide open spaces and strategic challenges.

  • City: Navigate through narrow streets and towering skyscrapers in a dynamic urban setting.

  • Neighborhood: A calm suburban area hiding unexpected surprises and tactical opportunities.

Each map offers a distinct tactical experience, ensuring every mission feels fresh and engaging. Use the rewards earned from missions to expand and enhance your arsenal. Unlock new weapons and develop strategies tailored to your preferred playstyle. Every mission presents a unique tactical challenge, making it essential to equip yourself accordingly for success. With realistic bullet physics and stunning visual details, every shot you take becomes a deeply satisfying experience. Supported by VR technology, Virtual Sniper immerses you in a world where every decision and action feels impactful and engaging.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: All
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Oculus OpenXR

  • Graphics: RTX 2060 / AMD FX-8350
